abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Brazil", { "or" : [ "TaxonKey is Comanthera L.B.Sm.", "TaxonKey is Syngonanthus Ruhland" ] } ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from MPM Milwaukee Public Museum Herbarium 1 records from Herbário da Pontifícia Universidade Católica do Paraná - HUCP 1 records from University of South Florida Herbarium (USF) 1 records from The Vascular Plants Collection of the University of Goettingen 1 records from Type herbarium, Göttingen (GOET) 1 records from Herbarium specimens of Université de Montpellier 2, Institut de Botanique (MPU)) 1 records from SORO - Herbário do Centro de Ciências e Tecnologias para a Sustentabilidade 1 records from CAS Botany (BOT) 1 records from University of British Columbia Herbarium (UBC) - Vascular Plant Collection 1 records from DVPR - Herbário da Universidade Tecnológica Federal do Paraná - Dois Vizinhos 1 records from HUCO - Herbário da Universidade Estadual do Centro-Oeste 1 records from SANT Herbarium vascular plants collection 1 records from Gothenburg Herbarium - Types (GBIF:IH:GB:Herbarium) 1 records from Museo Argentino de Ciencias Naturales "Bernardino Rivadavia" (MACN). Vascular Plants National Collection (BAv) 1 records from Natural History Museum, Vienna - Herbarium W 2 records from Actualización de las bases de datos del Herbario XAL. Fase III 2 records from Lund Botanical Museum (LD) 2 records from HVAT - Herbário do Vale do Taquari 2 records from Colección de Herbario 2 records from HUESB - Herbário da Universidade Estadual do Sudoeste da Bahia 2 records from Occurrences in SinBIOTA 2 records from MOSS - Herbário Dárdano de Andrade Lima 2 records from Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew - Economic Botany Collection Specimens 3 records from Auckland Museum Botany Collection 3 records from CRI - Herbário Pe. Dr. Raulino Reitz 3 records from IRAI - Herbário do Parque da Ciência Newton Freire Maia 3 records from SJRP - Herbário de São José do Rio Preto 4 records from Herbarium Hamburgense 4 records from Colección de plantas vasculares de Brasil del Herbario "Jaime Andrés Rodríguez".
